summary: With this mod "Ordinator Perks" menu in MCM can be translated much more easier.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Version for Special lies [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14959]here[/url]. Honestly, there is no difference between them, but everything is OK.

This mod changes "ORD_SKSE_Script" from Ordinator and replaces hard-coded string properties in it with simple "$SomeString" variants.

If you play in english, there is no reason for you to install this. It can be useful only for translators, they will no longer need to edit "Ordinator - Perks of Skyrim.esp" in TES5Edit or similar soft to translate menu in MCM.
Languages included:
+ English
+ Russian
+ Spanish (thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/6878999]Pashalsta[/url]﻿)
If you can make a good translation to another language, share it with me and you will get some fame on this page.

Well, that's all.

Great thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3959191]EnaiSiaion[/url] - the creator of Ordinator (and other great mods too).[/size]
author: Meridiano

files.name: Ordinator - Multilanguage MCM
files.changelogHtml:
Tested on SLE. Works well.
2 languages at the moment.

files.name: Ordinator - Multilanguage MCM
files.changelogHtml:
